page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: Churches,pubs,village halls provide well used social centres. Alternative entertainment found further afield. Unemployment not too serious at present.Workers in nearby towns have transport.Foreign travel influences some family diets which include rice,pasta,and a greater variety of fruit and vegetables.The health conscious eat wholemeal bread,while older residents stick to meat and two veg,perhaps for health reasons forgoing salt,fat,eggs,etc. There is no gas main so electrical appliances play a large part in daily life,oil or solid fuel providing alternatives for heating and cooking,a few households using bottled gas.Safety regulations exist for all fuels and appliances. Cats and dogs are popular household pets,with ponies,rabbits,birds,fish owned by a few.
